name: Checkers (mreze)
description:
It's Checkers! A totally original concept!

I joke, I joke.
Everything except sounds were made by me. Sounds were made by kenney.nl

Click on a piece to move it. You can put the piece down in the original spot without it costing the move.

For now, to double jump: use the swap turn button.

If this receives more updates: actual winning/losing, undo button, double jumping
